page.topic: Dropping DBF Tables or Sets from a Workspace
page.description: To remove a DBF table or set from a workspace:

step.description: Display the Tables/Sets tab of the Control Panel.
Click the following or select Table > Drop Table from Workspace or Set > Drop Set from Workspace.
The process can be reversed by Adding Tables or Sets to a Workspace.

page.limitations: Desktop applications only. Not available in Community Edition.

see.ref: Remove a Table from the Set
